dcterms:creator: A. Corral-Lugo
A. Daddaoua
A. Ortega
M. Espinosa-Urgel
T. Krell
dcterms:description: The dataset provides experimental results on the biofilm formation and disruption of Pseudomonas aeruginosa using rosmarinic acid as a quorum-sensing mimicker.
dcterms:title: Pseudomonas aeruginosa biofilm

dcterms:creator: M. Henkel
et al.
dcterms:description: This dataset includes kinetic modeling data for the concentration of n-butyryl-homoserine lactone during batch cultivations of Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1.
dcterms:title: Kinetic modeling of n-butyryl-homoserine lactone concentration

dcterms:creator: H. Beyenal
S. N. Chen
Z. Lewandowski
dcterms:description: This dataset presents the double substrate growth kinetics of Pseudomonas aeruginosa, providing insights into its growth behavior under varying substrate conditions.
dcterms:title: Double substrate growth kinetics of Pseudomonas aeruginosa
